name: Alakazam
author: Masako Tomii
flavor_text: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

attacks.name: Strange Hacking
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused. You may move any number of damage counters from your opponent’s Pokémon to their other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
